title: Who and when was the Blu-ray disc invented? - Quora

response.answer_text: Blu-ray Disc was developed by a group of companies called the Blu-ray Disc Association. The first prototype discs debuted in 2000 and the first prototype players in 2003. The format officially launched for consumers in June of 2006, about two months after the competing HD DVD format.

2000. The BD format was developed by the Blu-ray Disc Association, a group representing makers of consumer electronics, computer hardware, and motion pictures. Sony unveiled the first Blu-ray disc prototypes in October 2000, and the first prototype player was released in April 2003 in Japan.
